attributes.action: Devolve the counties of Durham, Northumberland and Tyne and Wear from England
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Idemand that the Prime minister devolves the counties of Durham, Northumberland, and Tyne and Wear from England.   To allow the people in these counties to once more have their own nation, that used to be called the ancient kingdom of Northumbria.   Devolve us now, seperate us from England for good.
